Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at The Mirage Alexandra Headland in Alexandra Headland, you'll be near the beach and convenient to Sunshine Plaza and Mooloolaba Beach. This 4.5-star vacation home is within close proximity of Underwater World Sea Life and Twin Waters Golf Club.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 38 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Rooms have private balconies. Flat-screen televisions and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and an outdoor tennis court. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and tour/ticket assistance.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, laundry facilities, and an elevator (lift). Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Sunshine Plaza - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Mooloolaba Beach - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
Underwater World Sea Life - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Twin Waters Golf Club - 4.7 km / 3 mi
Kawana Beach - 5.1 km / 3.2 mi
Aussie World - 10.8 km / 6.7 mi
Big Pineapple - 11.3 km / 7 mi
Mt Coolum Golf Club - 11.4 km / 7.1 mi
Queensland Zoo - 11.4 km / 7.1 mi
Dickey Beach - 12.9 km / 8 mi
Moffat Beach - 14 km / 8.7 mi
Caloundra Events Center - 15.2 km / 9.4 mi
Shelly Beach - 15.2 km / 9.4 mi
Kings Beach - 15.4 km / 9.6 mi
Coolum Beach - 15.4 km / 9.6 mi

The preferred airport for The Mirage Alexandra Headland is Maroochydore, QLD (MCY-Sunshine Coast) - 7.2 km / 4.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
